Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Bastetiyti with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard and crossed hands in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-bag that hangs over the shoulder; panel of Hieroglyphic text on the leg section; back-pillar and a plinth.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Miss H A Byars
In Memory of: L R Halford
